169729794898035.text: Are parking fees refundable for any reason?

 You needed to visit multiple business-related locations 
 You were transporting large or heavy luggage/equipment

16972979489807634.text: Can I bring my family along on my business trip?
16972979489807634.node_text:
Your business trip must be planned as though you were traveling alone (without your family). How doe that work? Provide receipts for only the costs associated with purchases for yourself 
 Collect comparison offers where necessary (e.g., transportation costs and accommodation) for what the costs would have been for only one person 
 Personal expenses must be strictly separated from business expenses 
 You are responsible for paying all additional costs that result from bringing your family along.

16972979489813075.text: Can I get reimbursed for a trip if someone other than the university is paying for it?
16972979489813075.node_text: If the trip is being paid for by a third party (not from the university) or was offered to be paid for by one, no money can be reimbursed.

16972979489813168.text: Is it possible to receive reimbursement for a trip if it is being financed by a third party?
16972979489813168.node_text: If the trip is being paid for by a third party (not from the university) or was offered to be paid for by one, no money can be reimbursed.

16972979489819305.text: What is the purpose of an A1 Form when traveling outside the country for a business trip?
16972979489819305.node_text: For all  business trips (even for short trips or ones lasting only a single day) outside the country to EU-countries, Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein or Switzerland, you will need to fill out an A1 Form , which must be brought with you when you leave the country. 16972979489827902.text: How much reimbursement are you entitled to if you transport coworkers who are eligible for travel reimbursement?
16972979489827902.node_text: If you are also transporting other coworkers, you are entitled to 2 Cent per person und kilometer, for each passenger who is also eligible for travel reimbursement. (To claim a passenger, they must also sign your travel reimbursement request.) If you are transporting business related items (e.g., files) weighing more than 50 Kg you are eligible for 2 Cent per 50 Kg and Kilometer. (Changes coming in 2022)

16972979489829056.text: What is the requirement for PCR-Tests to be reimbursed?
